mapper.select: SELECT tbl_area.area_id,tbl_area.area_name,tbl_area_level.level_flag FROM tbl_area,tbl_area_level WHERE tbl_area.level_id = tbl_area_level.level_id AND tbl_area.parent_id = #{id}

SELECT level_flag,level_name FROM tbl_area_level WHERE 1=1
AND tbl_area_level.level_id = #{id}

SELECT mfr_code,mfr_name FROM tbl_manufacturer WHERE 1=1
AND tbl_manufacturer.mfr_code = #{mfrCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT status_code,status_name FROM tbl_status WHERE 1=1
AND tbl_status.status_code = #{statusCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT tbl_monitor.thing_code, tbl_monitor.thing_name, CONCAT( tbl_monitor.thing_name, '(', tbl_monitor.thing_unit, ')' ) AS thing_describe, ROUND(AVG(tbl_device_alarmset.max_value)) AS max_value, ROUND(AVG(tbl_device_alarmset.min_value)) AS min_value, tbl_device_alarmset.data_flag FROM tbl_monitor LEFT JOIN tbl_device_alarmset ON tbl_monitor.thing_code = tbl_device_alarmset.thing_code WHERE tbl_monitor.thing_code IN ( SELECT thing_code FROM tbl_access_monitor TAM, tbl_user_ahr TUH WHERE TAM.authority_code = TUH.authority_code AND TUH.user_code = #{usercode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
AND tbl_monitor.thing_id IN (#{thingid,jdbcType = INTEGER})
AND tbl_monitor.thing_name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{thingname,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%'))
AND tbl_monitor.thing_code IN ( SELECT thing_code FROM tbl_device_time WHERE device_code IN
#{item}
)
GROUP BY thing_code,thing_name,thing_describe ORDER BY tbl_monitor.thing_order

SELECT tbl_monitor.thing_code, tbl_monitor.thing_name, CONCAT( tbl_monitor.thing_name, '(', tbl_monitor.thing_unit, ')' ) AS thing_describe, ROUND(AVG(tbl_device_alarmset.max_value)) AS max_value, ROUND(AVG(tbl_device_alarmset.min_value)) AS min_value, tbl_device_alarmset.data_flag FROM tbl_monitor INNER JOIN tbl_device_data tdd ON tdd.data_type='2011' AND tbl_monitor.thing_code = tdd.thing_code AND tdd.device_code = #{devicecode} LEFT JOIN tbl_device_alarmset ON tbl_device_alarmset.device_code=#{devicecode} AND tbl_monitor.thing_code = tbl_device_alarmset.thing_code WHERE tbl_monitor.thing_code IN ( SELECT thing_code FROM tbl_access_monitor TAM, tbl_user_ahr TUH WHERE TAM.authority_code = TUH.authority_code AND TUH.user_code = #{usercode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
AND tbl_monitor.thing_id IN (#{thingid,jdbcType = INTEGER})
AND tbl_monitor.thing_name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{thingname,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%'))
GROUP BY thing_code,thing_name,thing_describe ORDER BY thing_order

SELECT user_id,user_name FROM tbl_user WHERE 1=1
AND tbl_user.user_id = #{devicePrinciple}

SELECT org_id,org_name FROM tbl_oranization WHERE 1=1
AND tbl_oranization.org_id = #{orgId}
